19: וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣מוּ <sup>7925 </sup> <n>early</n> בַבֹּ֗קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>in the morning</n> וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲווּ֙ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and worshipped</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וַיָּשֻׁ֛בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and returned</n> וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> בֵּיתָ֖ם <sup>1004 </sup> <n>to their house</n> הָרָמָ֑תָה <sup>7414 </sup> <n>to Ramah</n> וַיֵּ֤דַע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>knew</n> אֶלְקָנָה֙ <sup>511 </sup> <n>and Elkanah</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חַנָּ֣ה <sup>2584 </sup> <n>Hannah</n> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <sup>802 </sup> <n>his wife</n> וַיִּֽזְכְּרֶ֖הָ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>remembered</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n>
20: וַיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> לִתְקֻפ֣וֹת <sup>8622 </sup> <n>was come</n> הַיָּמִ֔ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>Wherefore it came to pass when the time</n> וַתַּ֥הַר <sup>2029 </sup> <n>had conceived</n> חַנָּ֖ה <sup>2584 </sup> <n>about after Hannah</n> וַתֵּ֣לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>that she bare</n> בֵּ֑ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n> וַתִּקְרָ֤א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and called</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁמוֹ֙ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <sup>8050 </sup> <n>Samuel</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> מֵיְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>him of the LORD</n> שְׁאִלְתִּֽיו׃ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>[saying] Because I have asked</n>
21: וַיַּ֛עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>went up</n> הָאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And the man</n> אֶלְקָנָ֖ה <sup>511 </sup> <n>Elkanah</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בֵּית֑וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and all his house</n> לִזְבֹּ֧חַ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>to offer</n> לַֽיהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> זֶ֥בַח <sup>2077 </sup> <n>sacrifice</n> הַיָּמִ֖ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>the yearly</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נִדְרֽוֹ׃ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>and his vow</n>
22: וְחַנָּ֖ה <sup>2584 </sup> <n>But Hannah</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> עָלָ֑תָה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>went not up</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָמְרָ֣ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>for she said</n> לְאִישָׁ֗הּ <sup>376 </sup> <n>unto her husband</n> עַ֣ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>for</n> יִגָּמֵ֤ל <sup>1580 </sup> <n>be weaned</n> הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <sup>5288 </sup> <n>[I will not go up] until the child</n> וַהֲבִאֹתִ֗יו <sup>935 </sup> <n>and [then] I will bring</n> וְנִרְאָה֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>him that he may appear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְיָ֥שַׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and there abide</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>ever</n>
23: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לָהּ֩ אֶלְקָנָ֨ה <sup>511 </sup> <n>And Elkanah</n> אִישָׁ֜הּ <sup>376 </sup> <n>her husband</n> עֲשִׂ֧י <sup>6213 </sup> <n>unto her Do</n> הַטּ֣וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>thee good</n> בְּעֵינַ֗יִךְ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>what seemeth</n> שְׁבִי֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>tarry</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> גָּמְלֵ֣ךְ <sup>1580 </sup> <n>until thou have weaned</n> אֹת֔וֹ <sup>853 </sup> אַ֛ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>only</n> יָקֵ֥ם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>establish</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>him only the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דְּבָר֑וֹ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>his word</n> וַתֵּ֤שֶׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>abode</n> הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>So the woman</n> וַתֵּ֣ינֶק <sup>3243 </sup> <n>suck</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנָ֔הּ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and gave her son</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> גָמְלָ֖הּ <sup>1580 </sup> <n>until she weaned</n> אֹתֽוֹ׃ <sup>853 </sup>
24: וַתַּעֲלֵ֨הוּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>him she took him up</n> עִמָּ֜הּ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> גְּמָלַ֗תּוּ <sup>1580 </sup> <n>And when she had weaned</n> בְּפָרִ֤ים <sup>6499 </sup> <n>bullocks</n> שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>with her with three</n> וְאֵיפָ֨ה <sup>374 </sup> <n>ephah</n> אַחַ֥ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>and one</n> קֶ֙מַח֙ <sup>7058 </sup> <n>of flour</n> וְנֵ֣בֶל <sup>5035 </sup> <n>and a bottle</n> יַ֔יִן <sup>3196 </sup> <n>of wine</n> וַתְּבִאֵ֥הוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and brought</n> בֵית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>him unto the house</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> שִׁל֑וֹ <sup>7887 </sup> <n>in Shiloh</n> וְהַנַּ֖עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>and the child</n> נָֽעַר׃ <sup>5288 </sup> <n>[was] young</n>
25: וַֽיִּשְׁחֲט֖וּ <sup>7819 </sup> <n>And they slew</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַפָּ֑ר <sup>6499 </sup> <n>a bullock</n> וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and brought</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנַּ֖עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>the child</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> עֵלִֽי׃ <sup>5941 </sup> <n>to Eli</n>
26: וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And she said</n> בִּ֣י <sup>994 </sup> <n>Oh</n> אֲדֹנִ֔י <sup>113 </sup> <n>my lord</n> חֵ֥י <sup>2416 </sup> <n>liveth</n> נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>[as] thy soul</n> אֲדֹנִ֑י <sup>113 </sup> <n>my lord</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> הָאִשָּׁ֗ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>I [am] the woman</n> הַנִּצֶּ֤בֶת <sup>5324 </sup> <n>that stood</n> עִמְּכָה֙ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>beside</n> בָּזֶ֔ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>here</n> לְהִתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <sup>6419 </sup> <n>by thee here praying</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n>
27: אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַנַּ֥עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>For this child</n> הַזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> הִתְפַּלָּ֑לְתִּי <sup>6419 </sup> <n>I prayed</n> וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>hath given</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> לִי֙ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁאֵ֣לָתִ֔י <sup>7596 </sup> <n>me my petition</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> שָׁאַ֖לְתִּי <sup>7592 </sup> <n>which I asked</n> מֵעִמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n>
28: וְגַ֣ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>have also</n> אָנֹכִ֗י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> הִשְׁאִלְתִּ֙הוּ֙ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>Therefore also I have lent</n> לַֽיהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>him to the LORD</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>he</n> הַיָּמִים֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>as long as he liveth</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> הָיָ֔ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>lives</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> שָׁא֖וּל <sup>7592 </sup> <n>he shall be lent</n> לַֽיהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>to the LORD</n> וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>And he worshipped</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> לַיהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> פ
